name: Macaron
description: A French pastry composed of two shells and a filling in the middle

name: Brownie
description: A small, square chocolate cake that is soft in the middle, often with pieces of chocolate or nuts in it.

name: Soft Pretzel
description: Baked bread that is twisted into the shape of a loose knot

name: Baguette
description: A French bread shaped like a long, thin loaf with a crisp and crunchy crust

name: Cake
description: A sweet baked food made from a dough or thick batter usually containing flour and sugar and often shortening, eggs, and a raising agent

name: Pie
description: A dish made by lining a shallow container with pastry and filling the container with a sweet or savoury mixture

name: Poptart
description: Sweet pastries, made from two rectangular pastry crusts, sandwiched together and filled with a wide assortment of sweet fillings

name: Cupcake
description: Batter cakes baked in a cup-shaped foil
